prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with dual heads and a fierce expression.
Imagine a dark-type creature that evolves from a smaller dragon with blue accents.
Show me a ferocious two-headed Pokemon that thrives in rocky mountain caves.
Generate a medium-sized dragon with a black body and striking blue details.
Make a unique dual-headed Pokemon that can intimidate its foes with a loud roar.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of darkness while showcasing vibrant blue features.
Give me a Pokemon that has a fearsome appearance and lives in mountainous terrains.
